Heading:
Kiara Advani trolled for wearing fake designer dress. Copy toh First Class hain, says InternetRecently, an Instagram account trolled Kiara Advani for wearing a Thurley
rip-off dress for Kabir Singh promotions. The ensemble that Kiara had worn
featured a similar white crop top and skirt with multiple thigh-high slits,
like the original.

Priyanka Chopra stuns in metallic sheer top and pants at mom Madhu's birthday bash. See picsPriyanka Chopra celebrated her mother's birthday with a special dinner. They
were joined by her husband, Nick Jonas. The actress looked stunning as she
wore a metallic sheer top.

Priyanka Chopra paints NYC tangerine in plunging neckline dress with hubby Nick Jonas. See picsSeems like Priyanka Chopra has a new favourite colour. The actress was again
seen wearing a tangerine plunging neckline dress as she stepped out with Nick
Jonas on the streets of NYC.

Priyanka Chopra is all about summer romance in plunging neckline crop top and skirtPriyanka Chopra has been slaying her style game. Last night, for an event,
the actress donned a gorgeous orange and white attire.

Sunny Leone is all summer shine and glory in floral crop top and thigh-slit skirtSunny Leone recently took to Instagram to post a picture of her standing in
the middle of a forest wearing a floral co-ord ensemble. Baring her washboard
abs, she wore a plunging neckline spaghetti crop top with a skirt which had a
risqué thigh-high slit on the side.

Maanayata Dutt takes disastrous fashion a level higher with new Instagram posts. See picsMaanayata Dutt recently shared a set of pictures on her official Instagram
account and might we add, we are still asking, what was she thinking?

Kiara Advani copies Kriti Sanon's all-white airport look for Kabir Singh event. Who wore it better?Recently, while promoting Kabir Singh, Kiara Advani donned an all-white
attire and it seems the inspiration for the ethereal white outfit came from
none other than Kriti Sanon.

Ananya Panday steals the show at Karan Johar's bash in mini dress and leather heels. See picsAnanya Panday stole the spotlight at Karan Johar's bash last night as she
arrived in a mini dress and leather heels with co-star Tara Sutaria.

Sara Ali Khan is a fierce diva as she flaunts toned midrif in fiery red lehengaSara Ali Khan delighted her fans by sharing a gorgeous image of herself in a
fierce red lehenga as she flaunted her washboard abs.

Sonam Kapoor's birthday attire costs more than Rs 1 lakh. Details hereSonam Kapoor recently turned 34 and the actress celebrated her birthday with
a star studded bash. For her birthday attire, Sonam Kapoor wore high-end
clothes that cost over a lakh.

Neena Gupta chills with Alia Bhatt’s mom Soni Razdan in gorgeous mini dress. A-OK, we sayTaking to Instagram today, Neena Gupta posted a throwback picture of her with
Alia Bhatt’s mom Soni Razdan from her birthday. She wore a ravishing
pinstriped blue mini shirt dress, with a wrap detail for the image.

Athiya Shetty turns up the Mumbai heat in plunging neckline thigh-high slit slip dress. See picsTaking to Instagram recently, Athiya ​Shetty posted pictures from a
photoshoot, nailing the style game in an Anamika Khanna chic ensemble. She
wore an AK-OK plunging neckline slip dress with an angarkha inspired sporty
jacket

Katrina Kaif sets Goa on fire in plunging neckline powersuit for event. Slays boss lady vibesTaking to her official Instagram account today, Katrina Kaif posted pictures
of her all set for another round of a press event in Goa. She wore a
pinstriped monochrome double-breasted blazer over a black plunging neckline
top and pants.

Neha Dhupia channels boss mommy vibes in ethnic fusion attire. We need some fashion lessonsFor a recent photoshoot, Neha Dhupia channeled her inner boss lady vibes with
a fusion attire. The actress paired her kurta with a blazer. We all need to
take some lessons.

New Mommy Sania Mirza brings glamour to tennis court in athleisure fashion for new shoot. See picsSania Mirza recently shared pictures from a recent photoshoot on her
Instagram account. The 32-year-old tennis player rocked athleisure fashion
for the photos and we are swooning.

Priyanka Chopra on sarees by international brands: Shiny, Christmas-tree outfitsPriyanka Chopra featured on the cover of a fashion magazine recently. In the
interview, the actress talked about her love for sarees and how traditional
Indian clothing is not quite often seen in American fashion magazines.

Priyanka Chopra Jonas on her evolving style: I’m more adventurous now. I'm more confidentPriyanka Chopra Jonas is known for her fierce and chic fashionable
statements. Recently, for an interview, she talked about how her style
preferences change when she is in the US as compared to when she is in India.

Priyanka Chopra Jonas brings back sexy Desi Girl vibes for new photoshoot. All pics and videosPriyanka Chopra Jonas served some desi vibes by showcasing the best sarees by
iconic Indian designers on the cover of an international magazines recently.

Malaika Arora on wearing neon green suit like Ranveer Singh: My neon is better than yours babaMalaika Arora was recently spotted in a neon green custom made suit which
reminded people of a similar look that Ranveer Singh pulled off, not long
ago. To this, Malaika responded by saying that her neon is better but totally
inspired.

Priyanka Chopra teaches how to slay sexy athleisure look at the LA airport. Fashion goals, anyone?Baywatch actress, Priyanka Chopra was recently spotted at the Los Angeles
airport. For her look the actress rocked a comfort chic look in track suit
and denim jacket.

Sonam Kapoor wears pastel pink powersuit just like Rihanna. Who wore it better?For a recent award show, Sonam Kapoor arrived at the red carpet wearing a
pastel pink powersuit by Fenty. Creator of the brand and world renowned
singer, Rihanna has also been spotted in the same suit. Can you guess who
wore it better?

19 year old becomes India's first male model with autismNew Delhi's 19-year-old, Pranav Bakhshi broke many stereotypes when he became
the first Indian male model with autism to walk the ramp.

Queen Kangana Ranaut conquers airport fashion in shirt and mini skirt. See picsKangana Ranaut is the queen when it comes to slaying airport fashion. For her
latest look, the actress wore a crisp white shirt which she paired with a
gorgeous monochrome skirt.

Neena Gupta is a breath of fresh air in monochrome ethnic ensemble. We can all take some lessonsBadhaai Ho actress Neena Gupta delighted her fans by sharing a picture on her
Instagram that proves nobody does ethnic wear better than Neena Gupta.

Boney Kapoor on Mr India: Anil Kapoor had to be happy with only one outfit from Chor BazaarBoney Kapoor revealed that Sridevi had at least five stylists working on her
look for Mr India. The producer is now planning a sequel of the 1987
blockbuster.

Kareena Kapoor is a fashion goddess in one-shoulder thigh-slit lime yellow attireFor a recent shoot, Kareena Kapoor donned a gorgeous lime yellow attire. Her
stunning one-shoulder Stephane Rolland ensemble had a thigh-high slit which
increased the oomph factor of the dress.

Shibani Dandekar trolled for copying Deepika Padukone's Cannes 2019 look. Her savage reply is epicRecently, an Instagram account trolled Shibani Dandekar for wearing a
Giambattista Valli rip-off dress. Giambattista Valli is the same designer who
created Deepika Padukone's iconic green tulle dress from this year's Cannes
film festival 2019.

Hina Khan on flak for her Cannes 2019 debut: I felt bad. It was not necessaryAddressing the controversy that took place back home during her Cannes 2019
debut, when a journalist criticised her, Hina Khan revealed that though she
felt very bad it did not dampen her excitement and confidence.

Kangana Ranaut reveals how she slayed Cannes 2019 fashion game. Watch unseen videoKangana Ranaut delighted her fans by sharing a behind the scenes video of
moments before she hit the red carpet in her white Michael Cinco gown at
Cannes 2019.

Cannes 2019: Aishwarya Rai's stylist blasts website for saying she copied Sonam Kapoor's outfitAishwarya Rai Bachchan's stylists denies her Cannes Rimzin Dadu look to be a
rip off of Sonam Kapoor's 2016 look. She tells the website to do their
research before making any claims.

Deepika Padukone has a girl crush on Aishwarya Rai on Cannes 2019 red carpet. We agreeDeepika Padukone is the biggest fan of Aishwarya Rai Bachchan. Her comments
on Aishwarya's Cannes 2019 red carpet looks is proof.

Cannes 2019: Huma Qureshi goes boho chic in bralette and pants to leave Cote d'Azur out of breathFor her eight appearance at the 72nd Cannes International Film Festival, Huma
Qureshi brought the boho chic vibe to the red carpet.

Diana Penty ends Cannes 2019 on a disappointing note in metallic dress. See picsFor her final look, Diana Penty opted for a metallic grey knee-length dress
by Graine and it is possibly one of her worst looks.

Cannes 2019: Aishwarya Rai exudes elegance in tuxedo and sheer skirt in FranceAishwarya took to Instagram today to reveal one of her last looks at Cannes
2019. She donned a red and black brocade tuxedo, which featured oversized
button detail on the lapel and intricate embroidery.

Cannes 2019: Sonam Kapoor adds wings to bold white power suit for first red carpet look. See picsFor her red carpet appearance, Sonam appeared in an all-white ethereal look
in an ensemble by Ralph and Russo. She wore a gorgeous couture tuxedo which
featured a glorious plunging neckline and a stunning train.

Cannes 2019: Sonam Kapoor spreads sunshine in breathtaking strapless gown. See pics and videosFor her fourth appearance at Festival de Cannes, Sonam Kapoor Ahuja painted
the town a bright yellow in strapless dress, featuring multiple pleated

BJP Chitrapat Union files complaint against Hard KaurThe complaint states that Hard Kaur insulted and abused senior leaders Mohan
Bhagwan and CM UP Yogi Aditya Nath.

Janhvi Kapoor shares breathtaking monochrome pics. Don't miss Sonam Kapoor's commentJanhvi Kapoor shared three stunning black and white images of herself on

Shloka Mehta redefines elegance in yellow embroidered lehenga choli. See pic Shloka Mehta wore a yellow and orange embroidered lehenga choli, designed by

Kangana Ranaut nails rigorous workout like a queen in sports bra and tights in new gym pic Kangana Ranaut is taking the internet by storm with a new picture from the

Kolkata cop suspended in Ushoshi Sengupta assault caseFormer Miss India Universe Ushoshi Sengupta was allegedly chased and harassed

Mouni Roy pulls off incredible yoga asana in workout video. Watch Mouni Roy shared a video on Instagram in which she was seen doing a difficult

Deepika Padukone meets Kendall Jenner at mental health fundraiser in NYC. See pics, videoDeepika Padukone arrived in New York to attend the fundraising dinner for

Salman Khan proves he is the king at gym as he nails an intense stretch in new workout videoSalman Khan nails one of the most difficult stretch in the gym. The Bharat

Nita Ambani enjoys wonderful afternoon with sisters Kareena Kapoor and Karisma in London. See picRecently, Karisma Kapoor took to her Instagram account to share a picture

Arjun Kapoor details his battle with obesity in moving post: At 20, it took me 3 years to lose 50kgArjun Kapoor has written about his battle with obesity in a lengthy post on

Gloria Vanderbilt, heiress, jeans queen, dies at 95Gloria Vanderbilt breathed her last on Monday in New York. She was 95 years
old.

Forget India vs Pakistan match. Ranveer Singh won yesterday's World Cup game with his fashionRanveer Singh was at his flamboyant best during the ICC World Cup 2019 India

workout session on the street.

World Cup 2019: Nita Ambani with kids Akash and Isha cheer for India at Old Trafford. See picsNita Ambani along with her children Isha and Akash, cheered for India during

Neena Gupta, Soni Razdan and Anu Ranjan set friendship goals with this then-and-now pictureNeena Gupta is best friends with Anu Ranjan and Soni Rajdan.

Janhvi Kapoor belly dances in sports bra and mini shorts for a challenge. Watch videoFor a challenge Janhvi Kapoor flaunted her belly dancing skills. The video

Who is Suman Rao, Miss India 2019?Miss India 2019, Suman Rao is all set to represent the country in Miss World

Miss India 2019 winner is Suman Rao from Rajasthan20-year-old Suman Rao from Rajasthan becomes the Miss India 2019.

Sania Mirza and son Izhaan enjoy Manchester as Shoaib Malik plays World Cup 2019. See picsSania Mirza took to Instagram recently to share pictures with her son Izhaan

Virat Kohli sweats it out in the gym ahead of India vs Pakistan World Cup match. See videoVirat Kohli hits it hard in the gym prior to India vs Pakistan ICC World Cup

Sara Ali Khan is all about royalty in golden lehenga choli for sizzling new photoshootSara Ali Khan delighted her fans by sharing a gorgeous image of herself in a

Yoga queen Kareena Kapoor nails stretching exercises at the gym in sports bra and mini shortsRecently, one of Kareena Kapoor Khan’s fan accounts posted pictures of the

Shahid Kapoor's Kabir Singh promotion look validated by fashionista Sonam Kapoor. Internet loves itIt, indeed, was a big moment for Shahid Kapoor to get 'validation' from Sonam

Kiara Advani is a vision in white plunging neckline top and pants for Kabir Singh promotionsKiara Advani's fashion game has been on point during the Kabir Singh

Standing Seats on Ultra Basic Economy. To fly or not to fly, that is the questionAirlines are soon going to introduce a new 'Ultra-Basic Economy' class on
planes. These standing seats will allow airlines to squeeze in more
passengers per flight.

GoAir and Vistara kick off holiday sale with domestic flight tickets from Rs 899 and Rs 1,299GoAir and Vistara recently announced huge discounts for their domestic

is offering tickets starting at Rs 1,299.

IRCTC offers 6 days Himalayan Golden Triangle travel package for Rs 20k. Details hereThis package tariff includes hotel stay, breakfast, dinner and all
transportation cost along with sight seeing.

Want head or foot massage during tiring train journey? Soon you will be able to do so for Rs 100 Indian Railways will soon make the facility of a head massage or a foot
massage available during tiring train journeys at a price of Rs 100.

Want to enjoy an entire day at Taj Mahal? Pay fine if you spend more than 3 hoursTourists spending more than three hours at the Taj Mahal will be charged an
additional fee, as per a circular issued by authorities. Read details here.

Sri Lanka promotes tourism after Easter bombings. Local hotels offer stays at 50 per cent offTo lure tourists back, Sri Lanka is hosting international sporting events and
has mothballed a rule on minimum rates for hotel stays. State-owned SriLankan
Airlines is offering special fares and pushing joint promotions with the
government’s tourism board.

IRCTC launches 6-day Kashmir tour package. All details hereThis IRCTC package will include flight tariff, hotel stay, breakfast and
travelling expenses. More details inside.

GoAir kicks off holiday flash sale with domestic flight tickets from Rs 1,399. Details hereGoAir recently announced that in a new offer it will be giving domestic
flight tickets from Rs 1,399. The travel period of the offer according to
GoAir’s website will start from June 15, 2019 to July 31, 2019.

New Eiffel Tower zipline gives you a bird's eye view of Paris. Seen the video yet?You can never get enough of Paris, can you? From the Eiffel Tower, a zipline
flight is offering enthusiastic tourists a bird's-eye view of the city above
the ground

A weekend in the land of Bond: Bonfires and breathtaking viewsNot for nothing is Mussoorie called the Queen of Hills. If you are craving
that long due summer getaway, this hill town is among the best of
destinations you can opt for.

World's first guitar-shaped hotel all set to open in Hollywood this year. The details will blow your mindAccording to reports, the hotel is going to be a 450-feet tall building,
which will be built in the shape of the body of a guitar, making it the most
over-the-top Hard Rock Hotel in history.

GoAir kicks off flash sale with domestic flight tickets from Rs 1,375. Details hereGoAir recently announced that in a new offer it will be offering domestic
flight tickets starting from Rs 1,375. The travel period of the offer
according to GoAir’s website will last till December 15, 2019.

IndiGo offers flight tickets starting from Rs 999 to 10 lakh flyers. Details hereIndiGo airline is offering 10 lakh seats on sale to both its domestic as well
as international flyers in a brand new deal. The air carrier is offering
domestic flight tickets from Rs 999 and international flight tickets from Rs
3,499.

Air India to offer huge discounts on booking last-minute flight tickets. Details insideAir India recently announced that it will be providing huge discounts on the
sale of all its last-minute flight bookings starting from May 10.

What can you steal from hotel rooms? And what you cannotAt some point of time we all have taken a few trinkets from our hotel room.
Taking things like shampoos, soaps and other toiletries is fine, but taking
other stuff can land you up in jail or even get you banned from booking a
room in that hotel ever.

Airport staff tells you her most bizarre experience with flyer. Hilarious or scary? You decideAn airport staff shares the weirdest experiences that she has had during her
career. She talks about a woman escaping from a mental asylum and coming to
the airport and later being escorted back to the asylum.

Manchester woman wears seven dresses and two shorts to avoid Rs 6k excess baggage fineMother of five from Manchester wore seven dresses, two pairs of shoes, two
pairs of shorts, a skirt and a cardigan to avoid paying the excess baggage
fine.

Do planes fly over Mount Everest? Frequent flyer reveals chilling answersA frequent flier tells us how often do planes fly over the Himalayan range in
a Quora thread and what are the major reasons behind avoiding that path.

British Airways flight takes off for Germany, lands 1200km away in UK. Passengers have best reactionPassengers on a British Airways flight took off from London to go to
Dusseldorf in Germany. The next morning, they were met with a huge surprise
as the plane touched down at Edinburgh, the Scottish capital.

Selfie at this Phuket beach can now get you a death sentence in ThailandClicking pictures at a beach in Phuket can now get you a death sentence
according to soon to be implemented rules by the Thailand aviation
authorities. Apparently, the selfie runway at the beach has become a
distraction for pilots

Do you behave badly while on a holiday? Japan might send you backTemples, religious places and restaurants in Japan are sending tourists back
who behave badly. All these steps are being taken to maintain the sanctity of
these places.

Flight attendant shares travel tips to solve all your problems on boardA former flight attendant was recently asked to share travel tips that flight
attendants use for their journeys which passengers can benefit from and his
answers are a solution to all your travel problems.

Europe kicks off first underwater restaurant in Norway. Pay Rs 30k for an 18-course mealNorway just opened Europe's first underwater restaurant called Under, which
also means wonder in Norwegian. Situated on the southern tip of Norway, the
restaurant looks like a large concrete tube partly submerged in the North
Sea.

Vistara offers sanitary pad services on flight to celebrate International Women's Day 2019To celebrate International Women’s Day 2019 on March 8 Vistara airlines
announced the launch of a new service on their flights where they will offer
sanitary pads to women onboard the air carrier.

IndiGo kicks off Holi 2019 sale with domestic flight tickets from Rs 899. Details hereUnder a new sale, IndiGo is offering domestic flight tickets starting at Rs
899 and international flight tickets starting at Rs 3,399. The travel period
of the flash sale starts from March 20, 2019 to September 28, 2019.

Majority UK visas in 2018 from India were for professionals and studentsAccording to analysis done by UK Home Office a hike in the number of student
visas granted to Indians last year went up by 35 per cent to hit 19,505
visas.

GoAir kicks off flash sale with domestic flight tickets starting from Rs 1,799. Details hereAccording to GoAir, the booking period of the flash sale starts from February
24, 2019 to February 26, 2019. The airline is offering domestic tickets
starting at Rs 1,799.

Flight attendant reveals countries with most difficult passengers. India is on the listA flight attendant revealed which country has the most/least difficult
passengers in a Quora thread and Indian flyers featured on his list for their
drinking and sanitary habits.

Are Indians the worst passengers in the world? Flight attendant reveals terrible secretsA flight attendant talks about what kind of air passengers Indians are and

India.

GoAir flash sale has domestic flight tickets from Rs 1,899. Details hereThe booking period of GoAir's flash sale starts from February 21, 2019 and
will end on February 23, 2019. The airline is offering domestic flight
tickets starting from Rs 1,899 and international flight tickets from Rs

Jet Airways sale offers 50 per cent off on flight tickets, extra discount for armed forcesIn order to avail 50 per cent off on domestic and international Jet Airways
flights, tickets must be purchased between February 21, 2019 and February 25,
2019.

How much do cabin crew in India earn? Airlines inspector reveals salary of flight attendantsThe salary of cabin crew depends on various factors, such as the number of
hours, the airline that you are flying for and your seniority in the
airline.

SpiceJet flash sale offers cheap domestic flight tickets from Rs 899. Details hereIn order to avail the sale, customers can book tickets from February 5, 2019
to February 14, 2019.

IndiGo kicks off flash sale with cheap domestic flight tickets from Rs 899. Details hereIn order to avail the IndiGo sale, flyers can book tickets between February

Air India kicks off Republic Day sale with flight tickets from Rs 979. Details hereAir India is offering cheap domestic flight tickets from Rs 979 under its

Air India to launch holiday packages now. Details hereAir India is all set to enter the holiday packages arena and will soon offer
